Description:
Picturesque Block With Outlook Over Bushland & Hilltops
This exciting parcel of land is not only sizeable but also grants great views. The block measures 2045m2 granting great space for a well-proportioned home and maybe shedding. The half-acre block is on the Ballarat side of Creswick and almost neighbours the Creswick Golf Club. Along with the wondrous views, there are terrific walking tracks, bike tracks, bird & animal life and more at your future front door. A wonderful locale for a full-time home, there is no doubt that those seeking a quiet and charismatic place for a weekend that this would be ideal. The hub of Creswick is just five minutes walk away and Ballarat is within ten (drive). Those looking to enjoy Daylesford will find it 20 minutes away.

Description:
Affordable Getaway On 5.50 Acres
Superbly located in the gorgeous hamlet of Burnbank, this property is relaxed and tranquil, offering a relaxed atmosphere, and is surrounded by stunning scenery, walking tracks and is completely off grid.
This passive-solar timber lined home or weekender offers year-round comfort with wood heating and evaporative cooling, while also offering a rather spacious living area, a very functional open plan kitchen along with two bedrooms and a family bathroom ready for some renovation.
Perfect for those wanting a simple, stress-free lifestyle with approx. 25,000L of tank water for the home, a catchment dam with pump for the garden and solar power to generate your electricity.
Sitting on approx. 5.50 acres of land with a 3x6m shed to the side, this property is ideal for environmental friendly families, along with beautiful natural bushland to wander and explore at your leisure. The property is zoned farming under the Pyrenees Shire Council and has a sealed road frontage of approx. 276 metres with the school bus stop opposite the front gate.
Only 10 minutes to Talbot, 20 minutes to Maryborough and 40 minutes to Ballarat makes this property an excellent weekender with the scope for future improvement should the desire for the move become more permanent.
Insights: 1117 Lexton-Talbot Road, Burnbank VIC 3371 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Historic Creswick Cottage with Stunning Gardens
Nestled inside expansive meandering landscaped gardens is what may be one of the original cottages of Creswick. Painstakingly renovated and redecorated by its current owners to bring it back to and then beyond its original glory.
Featuring 2 bedrooms, both with Built in Robes, Open plan kitchen and dining with European appliances, tongue and groove walls and ceilings, warm and cozy lounge with wood combustion heating and a renovated bathroom complete with claw foot bath. Add to this the north facing sun room overlooking peaceful and private gardens, giving ample opportunity to extend and enhance the home.
You have the added benefit of the economical Midea Heat pump hot water service recently installed, giving a saving of up to 65%.
Situated on a huge block of 1387m2 with many stunning plant life, mature fruit trees, chicken coop, enclosed perma-culture garden beds and 2 sheds.
This home is a hidden sanctuary but just a stroll to the centre of town.
*1387m2 allotment with beautiful private gardens
*Easy walk to town Centre
*Ideal tourism rental
*unique period cottage
****Inspection by appointment only****

Address: Option 1 -1073 Coghills Creek Rd - Coghills Creek VIC 3364
Description:
Charming Period Home on 2 ha- (5 acres)
Located 15 minutes North of Ballarat on a Sealed road in the rich pastoral country of Coghill's Creek ,sits this comfortable period home comprising of 3 bedrooms,3 living areas and surrounded by colorful established gardens and fantastic shedding. The home is beautifully presented with high ceilings, large windows giving light and space to the warm cosy living areas that have split systems and in-built wood heaters. The upgraded kitchen has great bench space and loads of storage. There is an outdoor area that could be upgraded to create something extra special. The shedding is outstanding with a large 3 bay lock up workshop /garage with concrete floor and power a 2nd car port plus numerous sundry sheds including an old dairy, cattle yards and a hay shed.A new stock and domestic bore will supplement the current tank water supply. Being fertile land, it will graze a couple of horses or a cow or two. This property is a delight to inspect and has a great relaxing feeling as the garden host numerous shade and flowering trees and a myriad of bulbs ensuring lots of Native bird life. Buses to Ballarat schools stop at the front gate.
Note:-The adjoining Land -Approx 30.58 Hectares with 45 Megs of water is also available if you are seeking a complete farm package.

Description:
A Cosy Country Cottage
This little gem is situated just 15 minutes from Daylesford and less than 30 minutes from Ballarat.The property has three bedrooms(one currently an office) and two separate living areas. The solid Victorian structure has been recently enhanced by major renovations including the addition of the second living area ,a total rewire,replacement of the entire rear roofing together with a new toilet and vanity plus new carpets and flooring. All renovations have paid attention to energy saving including double glazing.The home also welcomes the additions of a porch,patio and pergola areas. The garden at the front is welcoming and compliments the establish fruit trees and scrubs. Other recent changes include roof insulation and range hood. A great shed and carport are ideal for those handyman jobs.Situated on a 1/4 acre lot this property is a must see.

Address: Lot 4, 100 Old Werona Road Kooroocheang VIC 3364
Description:
A LITTLE PIECE OF PARADISE & PLANNING PERMIT
Located around 15 minutes from Daylesford, is this 19 acre bush block with current Planning Permit. Nicely undulating, with kangaroo's, koala's, wallabies and heaps of birds to share with. The beautiful gums, black wattles and bulbs will bring this block to life in the spring time, but offer peace and seclusion all year round.
Perfectly suited to off the grid living, this is a most beautiful, peaceful place to be, and would lend itself to anyone who is looking for a safe place to come home to.
Inspection By Appointment Only.

Description:
Contemporary Lifestyle Living
Set in the very quiet township of Allendale sits an opportunity for a change in lifestyle. Approximately 5 minutes to Creswick and a short 15-20-minute drive to the popular Dayelsford/Hepburn Springs district. Upon entry you will appreciate the space that the open plan living/dining and kitchen offers, designed to suit all occasions from entertaining, to relaxing in front of the wood fire after a day's work. Complimenting the recently improved kitchen is a spacious butlers pantry, a great addition to any home. Comprising 3 bedrooms, master complete with walk-through robe with cabinetry and a very sleek and modern ensuite. The second living could be a games/toy room or that parents retreat or theatre room. The main bathroom is as beautiful as is practical with separate bath and shower, a spacious laundry with direct access outdoors is also very handy. A decked pool area along with a great undercover entertainment area, perfect for those family gatherings all year round. On approximately 2050 sqm allotment, enough space for the kids to burn up some of that energy. Chicken coop, cubby house, fruit trees and a couple of veggie patches give this property a real country feel. Double car lock up garage, open car port for 2 and a second carport for that caravan or trailer. A very smartly renovated family home in a great area, certainly ticks a lot of boxes. Don't be shy as this one will be popular, enquire today and come see for yourself.

Perfect Weekend Escape
Situated just a short 15 minute drive from Ballarat and only minutes from Creswick could be your next great getaway. The approximately 10.5 acre "Farming zone" allotment is a mix of cleared land, pine trees, seasonal creek and does currently have some gorse bush. Having said that, with some TLC what a wonderful property this could be. Whether it's to spend some quality time with friends and family, have some animals or ride the motorbikes - the choice is yours. Call today to find out more.
Directions: Heading north along Gillies Road turn left into Addington Road. Travel 900m and the property will be on your right.

Description:
Central Creswick Just One Block from The Main Street
A charming colonial cottage sitting on a large central plot of land is up for grabs in the beautiful township of Creswick.
This hidden gem is doused in history with high ceilings, picture rails, timber & brick fireplaces & ceiling strapping, yet requires some attention to reinstate its former beauty for today's busy families.
An original dine in kitchen boasts an old Agar combustion oven, timber ceiling & side cabinetry, while electric cooking provides a taste of the 21st century in advance.
The lounge is comfortable with a built in combustion heater plus a handy gas heater, while the main bedroom provides an open fireplace to add some warmth and character to the room.
The authentic timber lined bathroom offers a freestanding vanity with combination bath & shower with an enclosed toilet, while the laundry is housed in the older section of the home for speedy access to the outdoors
This large 730m2 allotment lends itself to subdivision (STCA) at the rear of the property with ample room for a single home or extension proposal to the residence.
A small shed sits directly behind the home, which provides extra storage space with plenty of land to add further or larger shed if necessary. Town water & sewerage are connected.
With walking distance to schools, shops & the supermarket, this central location will certainly provide a convenient location for DIY entry level investors, or those looking to capitalize on the block size, while also providing close proximity to Daylesford and Ballarat.
Estimated weekly rent from $200 to $220 per week.
The vendor has given instruction to sell and all offers will be presented & considered.

Description:
Unique Potato property - 309 acres (125ha) with water
The brand, land, equipment and water - Walk in/Walk Out
$4,200,000 (+ gst if applicable)
Situated in this highly prized location just north of Ballarat and approx. 90 minutes from Melbourne, is this opportunity to secure a wonderful turn-key operation, iconic potato brand and significant land/water holding in the renowned horticultural precinct of Mount Prospect.
Divided into 10 main paddocks and on two titles, about 90% of the total property area has been cultivated; rotating with potatoes, cereals, pasture in conjunction with a prime lamb operation.
The heart of the farm is based on the family established "Mount Prospect Produce®" brand; eight varieties of branded washed and brushed potatoes to predominantly wholesalers, restaurants and retailers, also straight from the farm gate giving the ultimate provenance experience. Of recent times, an export opportunity has also been established direct to Singapore.
The property is run using biological farming methods to ensure produce is grown in balance with nature and is as nutritious as possible.
There is a 120ML ground water entitlement included, which fills the main irrigation dam which has a further 25ML of surface entitlement. The main 80m depth irrigation bore rated at 14,000 gal/hr is equipped with a submersible 30hp pump, servicing the irrigation needs of the property via a series of underground piping and hydrants. There are a further 2 stock and domestic bores on the property.
The near new purpose built 2,200m2 main packing/machinery shed with 80% concrete flooring provides the ideal hub of packing, processing and storage and is completed with staff amenities, two office/staff areas and further machinery shed and new toilet/shower block. A serviceable two-stand Woolshed, sheep and cattle-yards, and hayshed further compliment this outstanding operation.
Financial statements and inventory list available upon request from agent on provision of a signed confidentiality agreement. GST may be applicable.
For further enquiries, please contact:
Adrian Smith
Landmark Harcourts Ballarat
137 Gillies Street, Ballarat, VIC 3350
M: 0400 178 945
E: adrian.smith@landmark.com.au

Description:
AN ACRE OF LAND IN LOVELY TALBOT
Set on a quiet road, this lovely fenced property is on just over an acre (approx.) and only minutes by car to the centre of town. There is a storage shed on the property to provide secure storage and somewhere to get out of the weather. Currently zoned rural living so there is potential as a building block (stca) or perhaps a recreation block for you and your family.
Blocks of this size are rare so don't delay, call for further information.

Description:
Great Family Sized Block with all Services Supplied.
Sitting on a parcel of land of over 750m2 is this fully fenced building block with all services supplied to the block. Ideal for families and first home buyers alike (take advantage of the $20,000 Regional First Home Buyers Grant), this is a great opportunity so acquire a quality building block with beautiful bushland aspects just walking distance to all of Creswicks amenities. Power, Gas, water, NBN and sewerage are all supplied with the property so you do not need to worry about those unknown costs when it comes time to build.
This will not last long so be sure to call Nik on 0448 407 387 to arrange your inspection.
Please note - The metal shed in the photographs has been removed.
*759m2(approx)
*All Services Supplied.
*Close to Transport, Schools, Cafes and Shopping

Description:
Inviting and Spacious Family Home
Impressively sized and designed for family and entertaining in mind, this 4 bedroom family home just a walk to the centre of Creswick and all the convenience that this thriving town has to offer.
From the moment you enter this light filled family home you will notice that it was built with family and entertaining in mind. With
All 4 bedrooms are spacious and have BIRs (master with walk through robes) and ceiling fans,
along with split system heating and cooling, plenty of secure parking including space for your caravan.
Freshly painted and refurbished, with hydronic heating through out the home along with a private salt water pool in the expansive rear gardens.
Rarely does such a property present itself to the market in Creswick.

Description:
Classic Log Cabin Home on a Huge Family Block
This 3 or 4 Bedroom Log Cabin Home with a flexible floor plan is on an expansive block of 1198 m2 (approx.) and includes Master Bedroom with En-suite and walk in robes and B.I.Rs to the other bedrooms. The open plan main living zone with new carpets and feature slate flooring has a near new gas log fire, functional hostess kitchen and separate meals area.
The formal lounge room has the scope to be easily converted into a 4th bedroom by simply closing in the current walk through to the living room with BIRs already there.
With covered front and rear verandas you will have no shortage of space for entertaining or just sitting back and enjoying the natural bush environment just a few minutes commute from Creswicks main shopping strip, sporting complex, train station and schools along Natural Gas and fast NBN.
The home comes with new fencing to all internal boundaries and presents what is becoming a rare opportunity to find an established family home on in excess of 1/4 of an acre.
Stunning Log Cabin Style Home
Huge Fully fenced Block of 1198m2
Close to Shops, Schools & Transport
Flexible Floorplan

Description:
Large Family Home on approx. 1.5acre With Great Shedding
Situated on a beautiful elevated allotment with stunning views & only minutes from Creswicks shopping precinct. The home could accommodate the largest of families, boasting 5 large bedrooms & study, master ensuite, WIR, 3 separate living zones including spacious open plan kitchen, dining & living which flows beautifully out to your large span line alfresco with manicured garden views and large family bathroom. Natural wood heating with transfer system, evaporative cooling + 2 split systems assures absolute comfort all your round. Outside you will find a beautiful landscaped yard with irrigation system to rear lawn & the perfect spot at the height of the garden to enjoy brekky with views as far as the eye can see. Main shed size of approx. 17m L x 7.5m W (approx.) with single phase power & concrete slab, this can accommodate, cars, boats, trailers with a separate section for a potential man cave & attached carport perfect for the largest of caravans. Approx. 20min to Ballarats CBD & only minutes to the freeway, this property idles in a nice quite street with plenty of space. This property is a must see to appreciate the presentation & care the current owners have taken, so dont wait, call me today to arrange your very own private inspection.
This property also comes with a 99 year lease of approx. 1,500m2

Description:
20 Acre Block in Central Goldfields
If you like to go gold detecting and bush walking this idyllic parcel of land is made for you. Bordered by Caralulup Nature Conservation Reserve with plenty of privacy to get away from it all. Features include a waterhole with plenty of space for trail bike riding. Property includes a 24ft shipping container. Cleared and treed areas for the best of both worlds. Located just a few minutes drive from Historic Talbot town centre. (RCZ)

Description:
Outstanding Renovation In Central Location
Here it is, the renovated beauty with the most convenient locale. From the contemporary entrance onward guests will be impressed as the attractive home has been refurbished with a modern, yet neutral-toned colour scheme.
Your family will have year-round comfort via the zoned refrigerated heating-cooling unit. This abode boasts three generous bedrooms and the sense of space continues with the dining area open plan to both the lounge and extremely functional kitchen with its stainless steel appliances, great bench space, breakfast bar and large pantry.
Picturesque views are on hand overlooking the vast front yard and the oak tree lined street. The window shutters throughout bring privacy and add a touch of style. The allotment is just over the quarter acre with 1105m2 of land and the property offers dual access granting convenience, privacy and security. Pretty and central, it would be considered a perfect weekender or maybe a B&B. Creswick's fabulous coffee and cafes are almost at your front door, while Ballarat is just ten minutes away, Daylesford a little more and Melbourne just over an hour away.
Those seeking a development opportunity will be pleased to know, the permit for a subdivision of 310m2 has been granted by council at the rear of the property.
Internal area
310m²
